thread.title: 15 Photos From The '90s That Prove Kids Today Will Never Understand The Struggle
thread.title_full: 15 Photos From The '90s That Prove Kids Today Will Never Understand The Struggle

author: Krista Torres
title: 15 Photos From The '90s That Prove Kids Today Will Never Understand The Struggle
text:
View this image ›
mjonbli / Via instagram.com Today’s kids can just send a simple text.
ID: 10586290 2. You had to spy on your ex or S.O. if you wanted to know what they were up to. View this image ›
Universal Today’s kids can just stalk them on social media.
ID: 10586310 3. You had to record things on a VHS tape. View this image ›
tgraf86 / Via instagram.com Today’s kids just hit a button.
ID: 10586536 4. You had to wait several minutes to connect to your dial-up internet. wenetinternet / Via instagram.com
mr_classicxl / Via instagram.com
 Today’s kids just automatically connect to wifi.
ID: 10586331 5. You had to physically leave the house to rent a movie. View this image ›
ttitudenation / Via instagram.com Today’s kids can sit on the couch and instantly watch whatever they want.
ID: 10586334 6. You had to get the photos from your disposable camera printed to see what they looked like. View this image ›
todayskidswillneverknow_9 / Via instagram.com Today’s kids can just touch a button on their phone and they don’t even have to wind anything up.
ID: 10586345 7. You had to make your own ankle socks. View this image ›
mrbitoni / Via instagram.com Today’s kids can just buy a pair.
ID: 10586476 8. You had to set an actual alarm clock. View this image ›
kgibson1030 / Via kgibson1030 Today’s kids can set as many alarms as they want on their phone.
ID: 10586364 9. You had to play games on the computer that you didn’t even understand. View this image ›
sirjammin_ / Via instagram.com Today’s kids have tutorials on YouTube.
ID: 10586518 10. You had to listen to music on a Walkman…and try to fit it in your pocket. View this image ›
_cash_me_outside_ / Via instagram.com Today’s kids get to watch music videos while they listen to songs online.
ID: 10586412 11. You had to call and ask your crush’s parents if you could talk to them. View this image ›
ptsulton / Via You had to ask your crush’s parents if you could talk to them. Today’s kids can see if you’re interested through a text.
ID: 10586423 12. You had to manually roll up the window. View this image ›
colss88 / Via instagram.com Today’s kids just have to push a button.
ID: 10586460 13. You used giant, plastic cartridges to play games. View this image ›
ninstalgia1 / Via instagram.com Today’s kids just need a DVD and they don’t have to blow into them either.
ID: 10586437 14. Your video games were so pixelated you could barely tell what you were playing. View this image ›
captiancookies / Via captiancookies Today’s kids have video games that look like real life.
ID: 10586446 15. And you had to learn how to make a whole pot of macaroni and cheese if you wanted it because EASY MAC WASN’T EVEN A THING! View this image ›
j_middlet / Via instagram.com ID: 10586453
